name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
summary: After two years of crime fighting and acting as the protector of New York City, Peter Parker/Spider-Man is finally seen as a hero. However, he never forgot the reason he chose this path, dedicating every day in his life to the neverending battle against crime, and thus he resumes his search for Dennis Carradine, the criminal who murdered his Uncle Ben two years ago, whose death inspired him to become a hero.
